== Additional Ideas ==
* A PPA created
* First patch provided
* First patch accepted/merged
* '''Developer''': First actual upload to Ubuntu
* '''Global Dev''': First upload of personal application into LP
* '''Sponsor''': First patch that you sponsored
* '''Smaller Delta''': First sync from Debian
* '''Caretaker''': First accepted SRU
* '''Shiny Things''': First upload of a new source package
* '''I'm ready!''': set up packaging/development environment (gpg, ssh, etc)
